properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 31 at 12:55PM MST until January 2 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne WY
properties.description:
...Winter Storm Warning Wednesday Morning Through Thursday
Afternoon for the Snowy and Sierra Madre Ranges...

* WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 15 to
24 inches. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph.

* WHERE...Sierra Madre and Snowy Ranges.

* WHEN...From 6 AM Wednesday to 5 PM MST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Patchy
blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Hikers and
snow mobilers stand the risk of disorientation and becoming lost
in whiteout conditions.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM WEDNESDAY TO 5 PM MST THURSDAY
